description: Add some chunky, retro style to your sneaker collection with this style. Fitted with burgundy suede uppers - and added mesh for breathability - they feature a chunky rubber sole and the brands iconic ’N’ branding at each sidewall.

The UB4-S GEL-1130™ sneaker pays homage to the ninth iteration of the GEL-1000™ series. Creative consultants from the Kiko Kostadinov Studio updated the shoe with mixed materials and new aesthetic influences.

model: NB X JFG CONVERSATIONS AMONGST US 574
description: Creative directed by Joe Freshgoods, Conversations Amongst Us reimagines the 574, an icon rooted in versatility. In a culture where you’re only as fresh as your white sneaks and your fit is the perfect conversation starter, this 574 design takes cues from the historical and cultural styles of communication and celebrates the conversations within the Black community, while opening the landscape for new dialogue.

A true-blue hue that’s ready for every aesthetic. The Chuck 70 is built off of the original 1970s design, with premium materials, extraordinary craftsmanship, and enhanced cushioning to keep you feeling good. The poly-canvas upper is joined by classic Chuck 70 details, like premium cotton laces, winged tongue stitching for reinforcement, and varnished egret foxing with vintage license plate.

model: ASICS X PLEASURES GEL LYTE III OG
description: Los Angeles streetwear label, PLEASURES implements normcore influences into their rendition of the GEL-LYTE™ III OG sneaker.A piping detail over the seams is met with greyscale hues to represent the general space between black and white—where the PLEASURES design ethos exists.Key details include: suede overlays, pigskin nubuck ASICS Stripes, a terry cloth lining, and debossed PLEASURES logos on the heel counter.

Los Angeles streetwear label, PLEASURES implements normcore influences into their rendition of the GEL-LYTE™ III OG sneaker.A piping detail over the seams is met with greyscale hues to represent the general space between black and white—where the PLEASURES design ethos exists.Key details include: suede overlays, pigskin nubuck ASICS Stripes, a terry cloth lining, and debossed PLEASURES logos on the heel counter.

model: REEBOK X MM6 PROJECT 0 CLUB C MO
description: These suede shoes take a page from Reebok’s climbing archive. Don’t overlook a single detail, like the durable rubber toe cap, luxe suede upper or nylon loop on the heel that was inspired by chalk bags. Watch your credibility reach a new altitude.

Flash back to classic Reebok running style. These shoes have a comfortable dual-density midsole and a TPU shank that provides extra stability. The one-piece moulded upper has mesh inserts for a layered look. A geometric design adds style points.

model: AIR FORCE 1 LOW '07 PREMIUM 40TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION BRONX ORIGINS
description: The “Bronx Origins” style nods to the fact that the shoe and New York City go hand-in-hand, in particular in the “B.X.” The arrangement found on the sneaker is relatively straightforward, but details like brass jewelry-reminiscent lace dubraes, vinyl-inspired profile swooshes and “BRONX ORIGINS” text visible through the semi-translucent outsole inject a special quality to the kicks.

model: ASICS X PLEASURES GEL LYTE III OG
description: Los Angeles streetwear label, PLEASURES implements normcore influences into their rendition of the GEL-LYTE™ III OG sneaker.A piping detail over the seams is met with greyscale hues to represent the general space between black and white—where the PLEASURES design ethos exists.Key details include: suede overlays, pigskin nubuck ASICS Stripes, a terry cloth lining, and debossed PLEASURES logos on the heel counter.

model: NIKE X BILLIE EILISH AIR FORCE 1 HIGH '07
description: Originally created for the hardwood, the Dunk later took to the streets—and as they say, the rest is history. More than 35 years after its debut, the silhouette still delivers bold, defiant style and remains a coveted look for crews across both sport and culture. Now, the university-hoops OG returns covered in crisp material overlays with heritage-inspired colour-blocking.

model: NIKE SB ZOOM BLAZER LOW PRO GT
description: If you were outside in the '90s, you know about this hiking classic. Originally designed in 1994, the Air Mada is breathable, durable and has functional pull tabs with low-key branding. Leaning into heritage ACG colours and original colour-blocking, the return of the Air Mada uses premium leathers and tooling for the modern adventurer.

PE Nation reworks the GEL-1130™ sneaker from the late 2000s with a contemporary lacing system and color palette. The stability running shoe from 2008 was originally inspired by the GEL-KAYANO™ 14 sneaker, featuring similar aesthetics as the hero trainer. Its traditional materials have been repurposed with synthetic leather paneling to evolve the shoe with a more modern aesthetic.

Constructed with premium leather and hairy suede, this new 'Photon Dust' colorway of the Nike Air Max Penny 1 is a must-have in the collection. It comes equipped with visible Max Air units and signature foam overlays.

Get going without a glitch in this retro-futuristic take on a '90s running icon. Taking inspiration from classic video games, we've unlocked next-level style with pixelated graphics and glow-in-the-dark details. Stretchy, 'hug your foot' fabric, Nike Air cushioning and an innovative heel cage bring the comfort so you can focus on the task at hand—whether that's AABA-ing, driving karts or smashing bricks.

model: W SERENA WILLIAMS DESIGN CREW X AIR FORCE 1 LXX
description: Fast, fluid, refreshing—the Air Max 97 celebrates its 25th anniversary with a cool colourway. The iconic design was famously inspired by Japanese bullet trains and water droplets, making the polished Metallic Silver mudguard and Chlorine Blue accents a perfect fit. Airy mesh keeps you cool, while full-length Nike Air cushioning keeps you riding aloft in first-class comfort.

model: W NIKE AIR MAX FLYKNIT RACER
description: The Nike Air Max Flyknit Racer is an updated take on the futuristic model. Crafted from lightweight, breathable Flyknit for comfortable all-day wear.

This streetwear superstar gets revamped with jumbo-sized details. Harnessing the old-school look you love, the Nike Blazer Low '77 Jumbo features an oversized Swoosh design, extra-wide laces and thicker stitching.

This streetwear superstar gets revamped with jumbo-sized details. Harnessing the old-school look you love, the Nike Blazer Low '77 Jumbo features an oversized Swoosh design, extra-wide laces and thicker stitching.

PUMA teamed up with the legendary Kenny Burns to create this handpainted limited edition shoe. The Iconic GV Special has been reimagined with fresh colors designed in collaboration with Alexander John, the WORK SMARTA & HARDER pack represents the two major cities in Kenny Burns’s life, Washington DC and Atlanta.

Get into the game with the Space Jam collection! With a new all-star for a new generation, LeBron James and the Tune Squad are ready for action! Space Jam Pro Leather features a Lola Bunny theme with embroidery and faux rabbit fur.
